column4: Question: When with my user I check "env" LANG=en_US (what I want) I do... "su" to root, and check "env" LANG=en_CA.utf-8 !!!  I don't want that... where to change it?  I tried everything... :(
You mean your keyboard layout or system language or what?
now plz does anyone have any experience with Samba they cna share with me? :o
keyboard is ok... system language too... I need the system to be iso-8859-1 to install ibm db2
